snippet: Federal health officials are warning doctors and patients that two hepatitis C drugs from AbbVie can cause life-threatening liver injury in patients with advanced forms of the disease.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration warns two hepatitis C drugs from AbbVie can cause life-threatening liver injury in patients with advanced forms of disease.
lead_paragraph: Federal health officials are warning doctors and patients that two hepatitis C drugs from AbbVie can cause life-threatening liver injury in patients with advanced forms of the disease.

headline.print_headline: 2 Abbvie Hepatitis C Drugs Can Cause Injury, F.D.A. Warns
headline.main: 2 Abbvie Hepatitis C Drugs Can Cause Injury, F.D.A. Warns
